entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Lucky Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:42 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lucky Lake 10:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:35 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 07:35 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023
